definition: Pingpu or Pepo aborigines (Taiwan), "plains tribes"
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ping
port/flat land next to a river or ocean
port/wharf/pier
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Ping Pu groups had spoken more than ten kinds of native languages in history.
sentences.chinese: 我國臺灣平埔族在歷史上曾使用十餘種語言。

sentences.english: Da-Gou is the former name of Ksohsiung. This comes from the language of Ping-Pu tribe.
sentences.chinese: 高雄的舊名叫做打狗，這是來自平埔族的話。
